The announcement was made at the Sibos event in Amsterdam via a video link from Steve Ballmer , Microsoft chief executive. Cloud computing, and specifically Windows Azure, enables banks to move from a capital intensive cost model to one which is based on the consumption of technology, says Steve Ballmer . "No longer will banks need to over-order computing resources because the scale of the Azure platform allows high volume workloads such as end-of-day processing to be consumed on demand."
